segments.text: Hit ' em high , hit ' em low . Class of ' 93 â€” let's go !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hi there , everyone . We hope you're having a good night !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Wasn't that football game great ! I just knew we'd win !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The night is young , folks . Get some food and mingle with those faces from yesterday .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Later we'll let you know who the King and Queen of the Reunion will be .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But for now , the band is playing the songs from our senior year . Get out on that dance floor !
segments.speaker: S2
